doc.title: Related Questions
doc.description: Ask a question about anything and AOL Answers. will send it to people & experts who can help. Connect with people and share your personal knowledge with the community.

div.p: Abilify- After a person quits taking it does the weight come off and if a person has the side effects of insulin resistance/hyperglycemia do those go away as well? And how long after stopping it does ...
